Articles.Content:
Hello community. I have proble whit my KSP 1.0.5 (steam install). Game crash randomly (recovery, return to space center, start launch, splash,......). Please help.

Sorry for my english.

http://uloz.to/xeaMPui7/2015-12-23-111900-rar - crash report link

http://uloz.to/x4gHvhb5/dxdiag-txt - dxdiag

 -force-d3d11 -popupwindow and aggressive active texture management in use.

ckan.exe mod installer in use.

thanks for help and merry christmas

Archom.cz

http://postimg.org/image/6r9jt6dql/ - mod list
